<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Security Policy Global Prefix (v2.1)</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/sdwan/v2.1/api/ngfwsecuritypolicyglobalprefixes/{prefix_id}"}></MethodEndpoint>



List a security policy V2 global prefix by the tenant ID and the prefix ID.

## Request
